column2: "Just when I thought things were finally going smoothly... A ton of enemies just showed up!"
"They're way too close to the venue. Everyone's itching to fight them... This isn't exactly the party atmosphere I was hoping for."
"But I've been working so hard, and everyone's been looking forward to it. We can't cancel the party now!"
"I really need your help! Drive away all the enemies near the venue!"
